DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that Anecortave Acetate for Depot Suspension (15 mg or 30 mg) is safe and effective in arresting the progression of dry age-related macular degeneration (AMD) in patients who are at-risk for progressing to wet AMD.
DOC.criteria: Dry AMD in study eye, Wet AMD nonstudy eye. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Under 50. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
